title: Cocoa Banana Raspberry Smoothie
directions: Place the frozen banana slices and frozen raspberries in the blender and let them soften for about 5-10 minutes.
Add the Medjool date, unsweetened coconut milk, and CocoaVia® Unsweetened Dark Chocolate Stick Pack. Blend on high speed until smooth.
Pour into a glass and top with unsweetened coconut flakes if desired.
ingredients: 1 CocoaVia® Unsweetened Dark Chocolate Stick Pack
pinch of unsweetened coconut flakes for garnish optional
